backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining ContactInfo and Inquiry types, exposing a query to retrieve hardcoded business contact details and a shared function to accept inquiry submissions (no storage).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a completed change to ContactSection.tsx that updates the mobile number prefix from 'Mob. No.' to 'Reg. Mobile No.'.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing component structure, styling approach, and backend integration hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with a warm, neutral palette (no blues or purples).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta, page title 'The Battery Warehouse', and script tag loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing Header, Hero, ProductsSection, ValueProposition, ContactSection, and Footer into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section component displaying business info fetched from backend (with 'Reg. Mobile No.' and 'gmail-' prefixes) and an inquiry form with loading/success states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, navigation links, product categories, social media icons, and Caffeine attribution link with UTM parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, business name, responsive navigation menu (desktop and mobile hamburger), and smooth-scroll section links.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image overlay, headline emphasizing Eastman products and low prices, CTA buttons, and feature pills.
React component displaying three product categories (Eastman Inverters, Car Batteries, Truck Batteries) in a grid layout with cards showing images, icons, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/ValueProposition: React component showcasing four value propositions (Unbeatable Prices, Quality Guaranteed, Fast Service, Expert Advice) with icons and a highlighted banner emphasizing warehouse pricing for batteries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the ICP backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React hooks wrapping TanStack Query for fetching contact info and submitting inquiries via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm industrial color palette (burnt orange primary, warm grays) for both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH values, container settings, Inter font family, custom shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking The Battery Warehouse website features, including homepage, product sections, contact info, and design requirements with warm industrial aesthetic for an Eastman battery dealer in Guwahati.
